field.name: custom_enable_navigation
field.label: Enable Navigation
field.description: Enable navigation. If enabled, the navigation will be appeared after the grid exceeds the given rows

field.name: grid_num_rows
field.label: Number Of Rows
field.description: Num of the rows of the grid. If more rows required by number of tiles and the gallery given width, add more panes and grid navigation

field.label: Arrows Margin Top
field.description: The margin top of the arrows, vertical sapce between the arrows and the grid

field.name: theme_bullets_color
field.label: Bullets Color
field.description: Choose the color set of the bullets. Each set loads different images.

field.label: Bullets Margin Top
field.description: The margin top of the bullets. vertical sapce between the arrows and the grid
